Structs/Setting.html#/s:7OmiseGO7Setting.name: mintedTokens
Structs/Setting.html#/s:7OmiseGO7Setting.abstract: An array of minted tokens available for the provider

Structs/APIError.html#/s:7OmiseGO8APIErr.name: isAuthorizationError()
Structs/APIError.html#/s:7OmiseGO8APIErr.abstract: Indicate if the error is an authorization error in which case you may want to refresh the authentication token

Structs/OMGConfiguration.html#/s:7OmiseG.name: baseURL
Structs/OMGConfiguration.html#/s:7OmiseG.abstract: The base URL of the wallet server

Structs/OMGConfiguration.html#/s:7OmiseG.name: authenticationToken
Structs/OMGConfiguration.html#/s:7OmiseG.abstract: The authentication token of the current user

Structs/MintedToken.html#/s:7OmiseGO11Mi.name: name
Structs/MintedToken.html#/s:7OmiseGO11Mi.abstract: The full name of the minted token

Structs/MintedToken.html#/s:7OmiseGO11Mi.name: subUnitToUnit
Structs/MintedToken.html#/s:7OmiseGO11Mi.abstract: The multiplier representing the value of 1 minted token. i.e: if I want to give or receive

Structs/Balance.html#/s:7OmiseGO7Balance.name: mintedToken
Structs/Balance.html#/s:7OmiseGO7Balance.abstract: The minted token corresponding to the balance

Structs/Balance.html#/s:7OmiseGO7Balance.name: amount
Structs/Balance.html#/s:7OmiseGO7Balance.abstract: The total amount of minted token available

Structs/Balance.html#/s:7OmiseGO7Balance.name: displayAmount(withPrecision:)
Structs/Balance.html#/s:7OmiseGO7Balance.abstract: Helper method that returns an easily readable value of the amount

Structs/User.html#/s:7OmiseGO4UserV2idSS.name: id
Structs/User.html#/s:7OmiseGO4UserV2idSS.abstract: The uniq identifier on the wallet server side

Structs/User.html#/s:7OmiseGO4UserV08pro.name: providerUserId
Structs/User.html#/s:7OmiseGO4UserV08pro.abstract: The user identifier on the provider server side

Structs/User.html#/s:7OmiseGO4UserV8user.name: username
Structs/User.html#/s:7OmiseGO4UserV8user.abstract: The user’s username, it can be an email or any name describing this user

Structs/User.html#/s:7OmiseGO4UserV8meta.name: metadata
Structs/User.html#/s:7OmiseGO4UserV8meta.abstract: Any additional metadata that need to be stored as a dictionary

Structs/Address.html#/s:7OmiseGO7Address.name: balances
Structs/Address.html#/s:7OmiseGO7Address.abstract: The list of balances associated with that address

Structs/Address.html.name: Address
Structs/Address.html.abstract: Represents an address containing a list of balances

Structs/Balance.html.name: Balance
Structs/Balance.html.abstract: Represents a balance of a minted token

Structs/OMGJSONListResponse.html.name: OMGJSONListResponse
Structs/OMGJSONListResponse.html.abstract: A struct representing a list response containing a data array of items.

Structs/OMGConfiguration.html.name: OMGConfiguration
Structs/OMGConfiguration.html.abstract: Represents a configuration object used to setup an OMGClient

Structs/Setting.html.name: Setting
Structs/Setting.html.abstract: Represents the global settings of the provider

Protocols.html#/s:7OmiseGO8ListableP.name: Listable
Protocols.html#/s:7OmiseGO8ListableP.abstract: Represents an object that can be retrived in a collection

Protocols.html#/s:7OmiseGO11RetrievableP.name: Retrievable
Protocols.html#/s:7OmiseGO11RetrievableP.abstract: Represent an Object that can be uniquely retrived

Enums/Response.html.name: Response
Enums/Response.html.abstract: Used to represent whether an API request was successfull or encountered an error.

Classes/OMGClient.html#/s:7OmiseGO9OMGCl.name: shared
Classes/OMGClient.html#/s:7OmiseGO9OMGCl.abstract: The shared client that will be used by default if no client is specified.

Classes/OMGClient.html#/s:7OmiseGO9OMGCl.name: init(config:)
Classes/OMGClient.html#/s:7OmiseGO9OMGCl.abstract: Initialize a client using a configuration object

Classes/OMGClient.html#/s:7OmiseGO9OMGCl.name: logout(withCallback:)
Classes/OMGClient.html#/s:7OmiseGO9OMGCl.abstract: Logout the current user (invalidate the provided authenticationToken).

Classes/OMGClient.html.name: OMGClient
Classes/OMGClient.html.abstract: Represents an OMGClient that should be configured using an OMGConfiguration
